t: Animal Kingdom: Season 1 - Prime Video - Amazon.com
s: This bold family crime drama centers on teenage J Cody, who moves in with his freewheeling relatives in their Southern California beach town after his mother dies of an overdose. Quickly pulled into the family's life of excess, he soon discovers that it's all being funded by criminal activities.

t: Watch The Animal Kingdom | Prime Video
s: In the near future, a mysterious phenomenon strikes humanity and unexplained mutations transform parts of the population into human-animal hybrids. A father and son desperately try to save their wife and mother, and themselves as the authorities close in.

t: Animal Kingdom (TV series) - Wikipedia
s: 1 week ago - Animal Kingdom is an American crime drama television series developed by Jonathan Lisco. It is based on the 2010 Australian film of the same name, which in turn was inspired by the criminal Pettingill family.
